question: Thampi Kannanthanam, who passed away recently, was associated to which of the following regional cinemas?
explanation: Thampi Kannanthanam (64), the noted Malayalam film director, has recently passed away in Kochi, Kerala on October 2, 2018.  He was most active during the period 1980-90. His most notable directorial films include Rajavinte Makan, Vazhiyorakazchakal, Bhoomiyile Rajakkanmar, Indrajaalam, Naadody, Chukkan, and Maanthrikam.  He had also directed a Hindi film \'Hadd\' starring Jackie Shroff and Ayesha Jhulka.  Kannanthanam had also penned the scripts for movies like Janmantharam and Freedom.
